name: should create a query with an N+1 column
description: Test case for should create a query with an N+1 column
expected_query: with "base_years" as (SELECT unnest(ARRAY[2014,2015,2016,2017,2018,2019,2020,2021,2022,2023,2024]) as year), "player_years" as (SELECT DISTINCT player.pid, base_years.year FROM player CROSS JOIN base_years WHERE player.pos IN ('WR')), "t75612ad2126469d530951355bab2ea09" as (select COALESCE(trg_pid) as pid, "nfl_plays"."year", SUM(CASE WHEN trg_pid IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as trg_from_plays from "nfl_plays" where not "play_type" = 'NOPL' and "nfl_plays"."seas_type" in ('REG') group by "nfl_plays"."year", COALESCE(trg_pid) having SUM(CASE WHEN trg_pid IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) >= '55'), "t254cd3aa2b83e2868e7f5ca7a6608b9f" as (select "pg"."pid", ROUND(100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN nfl_plays.trg_pid = pg.pid THEN CASE WHEN nfl_plays.first_down THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN nfl_plays.first_down THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0), 2) as recv_first_down_share_from_plays, "nfl_plays"."year" from "nfl_plays" inner join "player_gamelogs" as "pg" on "nfl_plays"."esbid" = "pg"."esbid" and "nfl_plays"."off" = "pg"."tm" where not "play_type" = 'NOPL' and ("trg_pid" is not null) and "nfl_plays"."year" in (2017, 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021, 2022, 2023) and "nfl_plays"."seas_type" in ('REG') group by "pg"."pid", "nfl_plays"."year"), "t0be8279c26d5128ba1442f75b07f7a57" as (select COALESCE(trg_pid) as pid, "nfl_plays"."year", SUM(CASE WHEN comp = true THEN recv_yds ELSE 0 END) as rec_yds_from_plays from "nfl_plays" where not "play_type" = 'NOPL' and "nfl_plays"."seas_type" in ('REG') group by "nfl_plays"."year", COALESCE(trg_pid)), "t1ae31819fd94e4ff3271a28d4a9114e9" as (select COALESCE(bc_pid) as pid, "nfl_plays"."year", SUM(rush_yds) as rush_yds_from_plays from "nfl_plays" where not "play_type" = 'NOPL' and "nfl_plays"."seas_type" in ('REG') group by "nfl_plays"."year", COALESCE(bc_pid)) select "tbc0f47cfe59a1398fb0e9c78eb43bba3"."pid", player.fname, player.lname, "player_seasonlogs"."espn_overall_score" AS "espn_overall_score_0", "t254cd3aa2b83e2868e7f5ca7a6608b9f"."recv_first_down_share_from_plays" AS "recv_first_down_share_from_plays_0", "tbc0f47cfe59a1398fb0e9c78eb43bba3"."points_per_game" AS "points_per_game_from_seasonlogs_0", "t69a82a5679e0babfe7e409feb1f22d17"."points_per_game" AS "points_per_game_from_seasonlogs_1", "t0be8279c26d5128ba1442f75b07f7a57"."rec_yds_from_plays" AS "rec_yds_from_plays_0", "t1ae31819fd94e4ff3271a28d4a9114e9"."rush_yds_from_plays" AS "rush_yds_from_plays_0", "tbc0f47cfe59a1398fb0e9c78eb43bba3"."year", "player"."pos" from "scoring_format_player_seasonlogs" as "tbc0f47cfe59a1398fb0e9c78eb43bba3" inner join "player" on "player"."pid" = "tbc0f47cfe59a1398fb0e9c78eb43bba3"."pid" inner join "t75612ad2126469d530951355bab2ea09" on "t75612ad2126469d530951355bab2ea09"."pid" = "tbc0f47cfe59a1398fb0e9c78eb43bba3"."pid" and t75612ad2126469d530951355bab2ea09.year = tbc0f47cfe59a1398fb0e9c78eb43bba3.year inner join "player_seasonlogs" on "player_seasonlogs"."pid" = "tbc0f47cfe59a1398fb0e9c78eb43bba3"."pid" and player_seasonlogs.year = tbc0f47cfe59a1398fb0e9c78eb43bba3.year and "player_seasonlogs"."seas_type" = 'REG' left join "t254cd3aa2b83e2868e7f5ca7a6608b9f" on "t254cd3aa2b83e2868e7f5ca7a6608b9f"."pid" = "tbc0f47cfe59a1398fb0e9c78eb43bba3"."pid" and t254cd3aa2b83e2868e7f5ca7a6608b9f.year = tbc0f47cfe59a1398fb0e9c78eb43bba3.year and t254cd3aa2b83e2868e7f5ca7a6608b9f.year IN (2017,2018,2019,2020,2021,2022,2023) left join "scoring_format_player_seasonlogs" as "t69a82a5679e0babfe7e409feb1f22d17" on "t69a82a5679e0babfe7e409feb1f22d17"."pid" = "tbc0f47cfe59a1398fb0e9c78eb43bba3"."pid" and t69a82a5679e0babfe7e409feb1f22d17.year = tbc0f47cfe59a1398fb0e9c78eb43bba3.year + -3 and t69a82a5679e0babfe7e409feb1f22d17.scoring_format_hash = 'ad64bf40cdfec0a1ebdf66453fa57687832f7556f3870251c044d5d270fc089e' left join "t0be8279c26d5128ba1442f75b07f7a57" on "t0be8279c26d5128ba1442f75b07f7a57"."pid" = "tbc0f47cfe59a1398fb0e9c78eb43bba3"."pid" and t0be8279c26d5128ba1442f75b07f7a57.year = tbc0f47cfe59a1398fb0e9c78eb43bba3.year + 1 left join "t1ae31819fd94e4ff3271a28d4a9114e9" on "t1ae31819fd94e4ff3271a28d4a9114e9"."pid" = "tbc0f47cfe59a1398fb0e9c78eb43bba3"."pid" and t1ae31819fd94e4ff3271a28d4a9114e9.year = tbc0f47cfe59a1398fb0e9c78eb43bba3.year + 1 where "tbc0f47cfe59a1398fb0e9c78eb43bba3"."scoring_format_hash" = 'ad64bf40cdfec0a1ebdf66453fa57687832f7556f3870251c044d5d270fc089e' and player.pos IN ('WR') and player_seasonlogs.espn_overall_score > '0' group by player.fname, player.lname, "player_seasonlogs"."espn_overall_score", "t254cd3aa2b83e2868e7f5ca7a6608b9f"."recv_first_down_share_from_plays", "tbc0f47cfe59a1398fb0e9c78eb43bba3"."points_per_game", "t69a82a5679e0babfe7e409feb1f22d17"."points_per_game", "t0be8279c26d5128ba1442f75b07f7a57"."rec_yds_from_plays", "t1ae31819fd94e4ff3271a28d4a9114e9"."rush_yds_from_plays", "tbc0f47cfe59a1398fb0e9c78eb43bba3"."year", "tbc0f47cfe59a1398fb0e9c78eb43bba3"."pid", "player"."lname", "player"."fname", "player"."pos" order by 6 DESC NULLS LAST, "tbc0f47cfe59a1398fb0e9c78eb43bba3"."pid" asc limit 500
